name: Buntroid
description:
BUNTROID - Made for the Definitely Not Metroid Game Jam.

Play as BUNTROID and delve into Zebbit's secrets! 

Game development took a little over a month.

SFXs were made with sfxr.

Music is by Eric Skiff.

Controls:

KEYBOARD

X,C,V - Buttons 1,2,3

S or Z - Select

SPACE - Start

Arrow Keys - Move Around, Aim, Elevators.

GAME PAD (XBOX360)

A,X,B - Buttons 1, 2, 3

START - Start

SELECT - Select, Weapon Switch

L-SHOULDER - Weapon Switch

R-SHOULDER - Button 3
